fields.summary: ELB Name truncated if domain name exceed 253 characters

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Load balancer names are used as part of the DNS name for the load balancer. When a long name is used the automatically added account identifier results in an invalid name:

{code}
Caused by: org.xbill.DNS.TextParseException: 'ELB-5d971714-6e05-44a4-ad4d-5fd3cabb95c6-ELBInstHealthMonTest-986930557896.lb.localhost.': label too long
        at org.xbill.DNS.Name.parseException(Name.java:172)
        at org.xbill.DNS.Name.<init>(Name.java:260)
        at org.xbill.DNS.Name.<init>(Name.java:287)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.DNSControl.AddMultiARecord(DNSControl.java:292)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor871.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:601)
{code}

When validating load balancer names the added 13 characters should be taken into account (dash plus 12 digit account number)
fields.summary: Long ELB name results in invalid DNS name

comments.body: [~chuck], please check if the sustaining team has cycles to pick this one up

[~sjones],

I missed your comment. Can you check my solution. We can definitely check for the 63 characters length where you are suggesting but further down the path, it'll get truncated if it cause the whole name to exceed 253 characters.. Not too sure what the proper solution should be.

Currently testing a fix for the label length exceeding 63 characters. Will enforce the 32 character limits used by AWS. For any case where the entire ELB domain name exceeds 253 characters, EUCA-7194 will cover this case.
Code has been merged into testing branch.

[~chuck] and [~sjones] can I get some clarification on this issue.  I've verified that now there is a name label limit and appropriate error message for elb name label with more than 32 characters and less than 63 for LB name and another error if exceeding the global limit of 64 characters.

{code}
[root@c-07 ~]# eulb-create-lb -z PARTI00 -l "lb-port=80, protocol=HTTP, instance-port=80, instance-protocol=HTTP" abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzabcdefghijkl
eulb-create-lb: error (400): Requested configuration change is invalid: Invalid character found in the loadbalancer name
[root@c-07 ~]# eulb-create-lb -z PARTI00 -l "lb-port=80, protocol=HTTP, instance-port=80, instance-protocol=HTTP" abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzabcdefghijk
eulb-create-lb: error (400): Requested configuration change is invalid: Loadbalancer name must not exceed 32 characters 
{code}

However, the added 13 characters (dash plus 12 digit account number) are not taken into account per the original description.

This LB is 32 characters plus the dash and account number.
{code}
[root@c-07 ~]# eulb-describe-lbs
LOAD_BALANCER	abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzabcdef	abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzabcdef-691288443381.lb.localhost	2013-09-18T22:14:08.881Z
{code}

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 3.4.0
Release     : 0.0.1475.20130913git5952d486.el6
The name length limit is 32 characters as per AWS. We would ideally return the same error as AWS for either of the cases you mention (see my earlier comment for error message details)
This fix does not take into account the addition of the "-" plus account number for entire dns name length. Perhaps also the elb dns prefix should be a part of that as well (default is "lb")?

[~tony], to clarify the 32 character limit is for the ELB name, not the first label of the DNS name that is derived from it. 

Please ignore the initial comments around the dash and account number, these are not relevant as the first label of the DNS name cannot exceed 63 characters when the ELB name is restricted to 32 characters.
per [~sjones] the 32 char limit is for the ELB name not the label portion of the DNS name derived from it.

Fix verified. ELB names cannot exceed 32 characters.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 3.4.0
Release     : 0.0.1475.20130913git5952d486.el6
